credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs
title: Figures near a Ruined Colonnade
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and brown and gray wash, white gouache on off-white laid paper
description: A ruined colonnade curves from left foreground to lower right. At the center of the composition a sarcophagus decorated with a cow skull serves as a resting place for a group of travelers. At lower right, an additional group of figures has been added with light pen strokes.
name: Drawing
